sentence.Network_en: It was clear that, wittingly or unwittingly, he had offended her.
sentence.Network_cn: 很显然，不管是有意还是无意，他反正得罪了她。

sentence.Network_en: When she had an affair with her friend's husband, she wittingly set off a chain of crises.
sentence.Network_cn: 她和朋友的丈夫私通，故意引发了一连串危机。

sentence.Network_en: Wittingly or unwittingly, that is what political leaders do all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多政治领导人都始终在有意识或无意识地做着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W) ... witting 意识的 wittingly 有意地 witty 诙谐的.

list.abs: i would never wittingly offend him ., 我决不会故意得罪他.
有趣的英语词汇... ... faggotry 男同性恋者 act swiftly and wittingly 神出鬼没 break the news 委婉的把坏消息告诉别人.
He wittingly deleted the references ., 他故意删除了参考内容.

entry.def: If you do something wittingly, you are fully aware of what you are doing and what its consequences will be.

example.ex: When she had an affair with her friend's husband, she wittingly set off a chain of crises.
example.tran: 她和朋友的丈夫私通，故意引发了一连串危机。

auth_sentence.content: This kind of history, so wittingly presented is just great.
auth_sentence.res_content: This kind of history, so wittingly presented is just great.
